categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars voice actors

nodes.text: Barbara Dale Goodson (born August 16, 1949) is an American voice actress who provided the voice of Mother Talzin in Star Wars: The Clone Wars. She is best known for her role as Rita Repulsa from Mighty Morphin' Power Rangers, the Machine Empire droids Orbus, Sprocket and Somnibot in Power Rangers Zeo, Icy Angel in Power Rangers Lost Galaxy, Notacon in Power Rangers Time Force and Mandilok in Power Rangers Wild Force.
